greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Least nonnegative square root of 3 mod n for n in A057125.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
mathematica: A057125 = Prepend[ Select[ Range[300], Reduce[ Mod[3 - k^2, #] == 0, k, Integers] =!= False &], 1]; a[n_] := Min[ r /. {ToRules[ Reduce[ Mod[r^2 - 3, A057125[[n]]] == 0, r, Integers] /. C[1] -> 0]}]; a[1] = 0; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 64}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Sep 20 2012 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 01 2000
ext: Corrected by _T. D. Noe_, Apr 19 2007 [The errors were caused by the faulty Maple command "mroot"]
